name: Project Gerbil
description:
Project Gerbil is a Round Based sword fighting game with a Soulslike combat system. There is A LOT planned for the future, but For now we are still working on it :P

The Controls are as follows(and soon will be customizable):
WASD = Move
Q = Block
E = Attack
E while moving = different Attack
Lctrl = Lock-On
R = Interact
H = Spawn Enemy(Soon will be automatic.....hopefully)
